data.name: textBox64.Value
data.value: = Fields.BillModel.CourseFee * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn + Fields.BillModel.ChairmanAllowance + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsHindi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsMarathi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsSanskrit = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0)

data.name: htmlTextBox1.Value
data.value:
Drawing up  {Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn} Sets  Theory Question Paper(s) / Section (s)
@ Rs.  {Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee} x {Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn} / {Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee)} per Paper/per Section.

data.name: htmlTextBox2.Value
data.value:
Supplying Marathi Version of Question Paper @ Rs. {Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} per
Question Paper for   ({Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} * {Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn}) /{Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee)} Question Paper(s)

data.name: htmlTextBox3.Value
data.value:
Supplying Hindi Version of Question Paper @ Rs. {Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} per
Question Paper for   ({Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} * {Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn}) / {Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee)}  Question Paper(s)

data.name: htmlTextBox4.Value
data.value:
Supplying Sanshkrit Version of Question Paper @ Rs. {Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} per
Question Paper for   ({Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers} * {Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn}) / {Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee)}   Question Paper(s)

data.name: textBox29.Value
data.value: = Fields.BillModel.CourseFee * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn + Fields.BillModel.ChairmanAllowance + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsHindi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsMarathi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsSanskrit = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0)

data.name: textBox30.Value
data.value: = " (" + Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.GetAmountInWords(Fields.BillModel.CourseFee * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn + Fields.BillModel.ChairmanAllowance + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsHindi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsMarathi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsSanskrit = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0)) + ")"

data.name: textBox31.Value
data.value: = " (" + Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.GetAmountInWords(Fields.BillModel.CourseFee * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn + Fields.BillModel.ChairmanAllowance + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsHindi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsMarathi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsSanskrit = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0)) + ")"

data.name: textBox32.Value
data.value: = Fields.BillModel.CourseFee * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn + Fields.BillModel.ChairmanAllowance + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsHindi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsMarathi = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0) + IIF(Fields.BillModel.IsSanskrit = True, (Fields.BillModel.RemunerationOthers * Fields.BillModel.SetsDrawn) / Corno.OnlineExam.Areas.Paper_Setting.Reports.Bill.RemunerationRpt.RoundToNearestZero(Fields.BillModel.AllottedFee / Fields.BillModel.CourseFee), 0)

data.name: sdsMain.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT Bill.Id as BillNo, dbo.GetInstanceName(Bill.InstanceId) AS InstanceName, Bill.FacultyId, dbo.GetFacultyName(Bill.FacultyId) AS FacultyName, Bill.CollegeId, dbo.GetCollegeName(Bill.CollegeId) AS CollegeName, Bill.CourseId, dbo.GetCourseName(Bill.CourseId) AS CourseName, Bill.CoursePartId, dbo.GetCoursePartName(Bill.CoursePartId) AS CoursePartName, Bill.SubjectId, dbo.GetSubjectName(Bill.SubjectId) AS SubjectName, Bill.StaffId, dbo.GetStaffNameWithSalutation(Bill.StaffId) AS StaffName, dbo.GetDesignationName(Bill.StaffId) AS DesignationName, dbo.GetStaffAddress(Bill.StaffId) AS Address1, Bill.BasicPay, Bill.TA, Bill.DA, Bill.Travel, Bill.AllottedFee, Bill.CourseFee, Bill.TotalFee, Bill.FromPlace, Bill.ToPlace, Bill.TotalDistance, Bill.TravelingMode, Bill.IsHindi, Bill.IsMarathi, Bill.IsSanskrit, Bill.SetsDrawn, dbo.GetRemuneration(Bill.CoursePartId) AS Remuneration, dbo.GetRemunerationForOthers(Bill.InstanceId, Bill.CoursePartId) AS RemunerationForOthers, Bill.ChairmanAllowance, Bill.OtherAllowance, dbo.GetIsInternal(Bill.InstanceId, Bill.FacultyId, Bill.CollegeId, Bill.CourseId, Bill.CoursePartId, Bill.SubjectId, Bill.StaffId) AS IsInternal, dbo.GetDesignationOfStaff(Bill.StaffId) AS DesignationName, Staff.BankName, Staff.BranchName, Staff.BankAccountNo, Staff.IfscCode, IIF(dbo.GetIsModerator(Bill.InstanceId, Bill.FacultyId, Bill.CollegeId, Bill.CourseId, Bill.CoursePartId, Bill.SubjectId, Bill.StaffId) = 1, dbo.GetMeetingDateModerator(Bill.InstanceId, Bill.FacultyId, Bill.CollegeId, Bill.CourseId, Bill.CoursePartId, Bill.SubjectId), dbo.GetMeetingDateTheory(Bill.InstanceId, Bill.FacultyId, Bill.CollegeId, Bill.CourseId, Bill.CoursePartId, Bill.SubjectId)) AS MeetingDate FROM Bill INNER JOIN Staff ON Bill.StaffId = Staff.Id WHERE (Bill.InstanceId = @InstanceId) AND (Bill.CollegeId IN (@CollegeId)) AND (Bill.FacultyId IN (@FacultyId)) AND (Bill.CourseId IN (@CourseId)) AND (Bill.CoursePartId IN (@CoursePartId)) AND (Bill.SubjectId IN (@SubjectId))
